items.sentence: Tom knew that Mary was unlikely to want to do that.
I wasn't as tempted to do that as Tom seemed to be.
I've been doing that for Tom for quite a few years.
I don't understand why Tom was supposed to do that.
You are hereby required to surrender your firearms.
I tried to change the topic as quickly as possible.
Do you always eat lunch at the same time every day?
My cat meows all day because he wants my attention.
What was Tom looking for out there in the backyard?
I don't feel well today and prefer to stay at home.
